title: Maghella
description:
Maghella is an adult fantasy fumetto (comic) of the late 70ties (various reprints) noted for its prestigious artwork (quality hike around issue #41). Dino Leonetti did most of the pencilwork, script: Furio Arrasich.

The 50 or so issues collected in this torrent, in part a compilation, can be downloaded as separate rar files (if things work out). The language versions are indicated. Low-res scans [page height under 800px] are marked as such. Most of the scans are 1000-1200px, some more recent ones 1800-1200 [height-width]. The standard fumetti page carries only 2 panels, not the 8 or 16 of the more common letter format.

All issues did originally segue into one another (grand total: 141 issues plus supplements).

Previews:
 
http://www.comicartfans.com/comic-artists/dino_leonetti.asp
 
http://wingsoverwater.5cz.de/fumetto/maghella.htm (issue grid, nearly all the covers, no interior panels) 
 
http://shentai.org/maghella-comics-french

Not included, 9 high quality Finnish Maghella scans (issues #1-9) which can be downlowded directly from: http://koti.mbnet.fi/pe1/files.html.

Pinterest, search term: Maghella

More Dutch versions can be found in the following newsgroups:

alt.binaries.stripboeken.nl
a.b.pictures.comic-strips
